```{r}
#mole_unit <- 6.022e20 #Mili mole
# mole_unit_from_nano_mole <- 1e-6
# mole_unit_from_mole <- 1e3

mole_unit <- 6.022e14 #nano mole
mole_unit_from_nano_mole <- 1
mole_unit_from_mole <- 1e9
time_unit_from_sec <- 1/3600 #Use hour instead of seconds

K_M_siRNA <- 0.1 * mole_unit_from_nano_mole
k_on_siRNA <- 3.6e7 / (mole_unit_from_mole * time_unit_from_sec)
k_off_siRNA <- 7.7e-4 / time_unit_from_sec
k_cat_siRNA <- 8.1e-4 / time_unit_from_sec

k_on_miRNA <- 0.2e8 / (mole_unit_from_mole * time_unit_from_sec)
k_off_miRNA <- 0.051e-2 / time_unit_from_sec

somatic_volume <- 4.4e-12
oocyte_volume <- 260e-12

total_RNA_somatic <- 1e6 #5e5 - 1e6
total_RNA_oocyte <- 25e6

let7_somatic <- 5e4 / mole_unit
let7_oocyte <- 3.5e4 / mole_unit

let7_targets_somatic <- (1380+2884+20414) / mole_unit #8-mer, 7-mer and 6-mers respectively from Bosson 2014
let7_targets_oocyte <- let7_targets_somatic * (oocyte_volume / somatic_volume)

times <- seq(0,24*60*60 * time_unit_from_sec, length.out = 100)


one_step_degradation <- function(t, state, parameters) {
  with(as.list(c(state, parameters)), {
    d_target <- -k_on * enzyme * target + k_off * complex 
    d_enzyme <- -k_on * enzyme * target + k_off * complex + k_cat * complex
    d_complex <- k_on * enzyme * target - k_off * complex - k_cat * complex
    list(c(d_target, d_enzyme, d_complex))
  })
}

plot_ode_result <- function(out, title) {
  out_tidy <- out %>% as.data.frame() %>% 
    gather(type, concentration, -time) %>%
    mutate(time_h = time / (3600 * time_unit_from_sec)) 
    
  
  uncleaved_plot <- out_tidy %>% 
    filter(type != "enzyme") %>%
    group_by(time_h) %>%
    summarise(all_uncleaved = sum(concentration)) %>%
    (function(data) { 
      ggplot(data,aes(x = time_h, y = all_uncleaved)) + geom_line() +
        ggtitle(paste0(title," uncleaved RNAs"))  +
        ylim(-1e-5, max(data$all_uncleaved)) 
    })

  print(uncleaved_plot)
  
  auxiliary_plot <- 
    ggplot(out_tidy, aes(x = time_h, y = concentration, color = type, linetype = type)) + geom_line() +
    ggtitle(paste0(title," all reactants") ) + 
    ylim(-1e-5, max(out_tidy$concentration))


  print(auxiliary_plot)
}

```


## Sanity check: simulating MM kinetics for siRNA 

We want to get complete degradation with siRNA in oocyte in a reasonable time

```{r}

hypothetical_siRNA_oocyte <- let7_oocyte
hypothetical_siRNA_targets_oocyte <- let7_targets_oocyte

params_siRNA <- c(k_cat = k_cat_siRNA, k_on = k_on_siRNA, k_off = k_off_siRNA)


state <- c(target = hypothetical_siRNA_targets_oocyte / oocyte_volume, enzyme = hypothetical_siRNA_oocyte / oocyte_volume, complex = 0)

out_siRNA <- ode(y = state, times = times, func = one_step_degradation, parms = params_siRNA)
plot_ode_result(out_siRNA,paste0("Hypothethical siRNA, oocyte, prop AGO = ", prop_available_siRNA))
  
```

Modulating just k_cat for let7 is enough - to get full let7 efficiency at somatic cells but have negligible degradation in oocyte for $k_{cat,\mathrm{let7}} \in (0.05 * k_{cat,\mathrm{siRNA}}, 0.3 * k_{cat,\mathrm{siRNA}})$.

```{r}
for(k_cat_coef in c(0.05,0.2,0.3)) {
  k_cat_let7_one_step <- k_cat_coef * k_cat_siRNA
  params_let7_one_step <- c(k_cat = k_cat_let7_one_step, k_on = k_on_miRNA, k_off = k_off_miRNA)
  
  state <- c(target = let7_targets_somatic / somatic_volume, enzyme = let7_somatic / somatic_volume, complex = 0)
  
  out_let7_one_step_somatic <- ode(y = state, times = times, func = one_step_degradation, parms = params_let7_one_step)
  
  plot_ode_result(out_let7_one_step_somatic, paste0("let7 - somatic k_cat_coef = ", k_cat_coef))
  
  
  state <- c(target = let7_targets_oocyte / oocyte_volume, enzyme = let7_oocyte / oocyte_volume, complex = 0)
  
  out_let7_one_step_oo <- ode(y = state, times = times, func = one_step_degradation, parms = params_let7_one_step)
  
  plot_ode_result(out_let7_one_step_oo, paste0("let7 - oocyte k_cat_coef = ", k_cat_coef))
}
```

Experimenting with two step reactions

```{r}
k_cat_let7_two_step <- 0.2 * k_cat_siRNA
k_intermediate_let7 <- 1 * k_cat_siRNA


two_step_degradation <- function(t, state, parameters) {
  with(as.list(c(state, parameters)), {
    d_target <- -k_on * enzyme * target + k_off * complex 
    d_enzyme <- -k_on * enzyme * target + k_off * complex + k_cat * intermediate
    d_complex <- k_on * enzyme * target - k_off * complex - k_intermediate * complex
    d_intermediate <- k_intermediate * complex - k_cat * intermediate
    list(c(d_target, d_enzyme, d_complex, d_intermediate))
  })
}

params_let7 <- c(k_on = k_on_miRNA, k_off = k_off_miRNA, k_cat = k_cat_let7_two_step, k_intermediate = k_intermediate_let7)

state_somatic <- c(target = let7_targets_oocyte / somatic_volume, enzyme = let7_somatic / somatic_volume, complex = 0, intermediate = 0)

out_let7 <- ode(y = state_somatic, times = times, func = two_step_degradation, parms = params_let7)



plot_ode_result(out_let7, "Somatic")

state_oo <- c(target = let7_targets_oocyte / oocyte_volume, enzyme = let7_oocyte / oocyte_volume, complex = 0, intermediate = 0)

out_let7_oo <- ode(y = state_oo, times = times, func = two_step_degradation, parms = params_let7)

plot_ode_result(out_let7_oo, "Oocyte")


```
